subject: Verify your account
body_text: Your account has been temporarily suspended. Please verify your details at http://secure-login-update.com.

subject: KYC Verification Required
body_text: Dear SBI Customer, your KYC is pending. Click https://sbi-verify.in to complete now.

subject: Password Reset Required
body_text: Someone tried to access your account. Reset your password here: http://reset-password-security.com.

subject: Your parcel is on hold
body_text: Pay ₹10 handling fee to release your parcel: http://postservice.in/parcel-release.

subject: Important tax update
body_text: Your PAN card is on hold. Update KYC details at http://incometax-update.gov.in.

subject: Amazon order refund
body_text: You have received a refund. Enter your bank details to claim: http://amazon-refund.info.

subject: Lottery Winner
body_text: Congratulations! You’ve won ₹10 lakh. Provide your bank details to claim your prize.

subject: Credit card blocked
body_text: Your HDFC card has been blocked. Verify identity here: http://hdfc-verify.in.

subject: Urgent payment alert
body_text: Your electricity bill is overdue. Pay immediately using this link: http://bescom-pay.in.

subject: Job opportunity from Google
body_text: Dear candidate, apply now by sending ₹500 registration fee to our HR manager.

subject: Bank update
body_text: Your bank has introduced new features. Log in from your account dashboard to explore.

subject: Meeting schedule
body_text: Please find attached the meeting agenda for tomorrow’s discussion.

subject: Project status
body_text: The project documentation has been updated on the shared drive.

subject: University notice
body_text: Examination form submission deadline is 15 March 2025.

subject: Invoice from Amazon
body_text: Your order #AX23901 has been successfully delivered. View invoice attached.

subject: Weekly newsletter
body_text: Here’s your weekly update on technology and innovation news.

subject: Team outing
body_text: Let’s finalize a place for our weekend team outing.

subject: Payment confirmation
body_text: Your payment of ₹1,200 to Zomato has been completed successfully.

subject: Internship offer
body_text: Congratulations! You’ve been selected for the internship program at Infosys.

subject: Netflix subscription
body_text: Your Netflix subscription has been renewed successfully for this month.

subject: Your account is locked
body_text: We detected suspicious activity. Log in to restore access: http://secure-login-helpdesk.net.

subject: Paytm KYC update
body_text: Your Paytm wallet will be blocked if you don’t verify now: http://paytm-kyc.in.

subject: IRCTC booking issue
body_text: Your ticket booking failed. Re-enter your card details to complete payment.

subject: Apple ID alert
body_text: Your Apple ID has been suspended. Re-activate it at http://appleid-recovery.com.

subject: Google security notice
body_text: Your account sign-in attempt failed. Reset password immediately.

subject: Bank statement
body_text: Your bank statement for March 2025 is ready for download.

subject: Salary credit
body_text: Your salary has been credited to your HDFC account.

subject: Times of India subscription
body_text: Thank you for renewing your Times of India digital subscription.

subject: College event
body_text: Join us for TechFest 2025 on 21 February!

subject: Password change confirmation
body_text: Your password was changed successfully. If this wasn’t you, contact support.

subject: Delivery confirmation
body_text: Your Flipkart order has been delivered successfully.

subject: Airtel offer
body_text: Recharge now and get 2 GB extra data free.

subject: Bank fraud alert
body_text: We noticed an unauthorized login attempt. Click here to secure your account: http://bank-fraud-secure.net.

subject: EPFO update
body_text: Your PF withdrawal request is on hold. Verify your Aadhaar now.

subject: Income Tax refund
body_text: Your refund is ready. Provide your bank details to receive ₹4,560.

subject: PAN verification
body_text: Your PAN will be deactivated soon. Update details at http://pan-verify.in.

subject: Student assignment
body_text: Please upload your assignment before the deadline.

subject: Meeting link
body_text: Join the Zoom meeting using the following link: https://zoom.us/j/123456789.

subject: Attendance report
body_text: Monthly attendance report for February attached.

subject: Medical appointment
body_text: Your appointment with Dr Sharma is confirmed for 10 Oct 2025.

subject: Travel itinerary
body_text: Attached are your flight details and hotel booking confirmation.

subject: Security alert
body_text: Your Google Drive files are at risk. Restore immediately: http://drive-secure.com.

subject: Unusual login
body_text: We noticed login attempts from another location. Verify here: http://verify-now.com.

subject: Delivery issue
body_text: Your parcel cannot be delivered. Enter your address again at http://delivery-fix.in.

subject: Electricity disconnection
body_text: Your electricity connection will be disconnected today. Pay ₹100 now.

subject: Social media verification
body_text: Verify your Instagram account to avoid deactivation.

subject: Contest entry
body_text: Participate in our quiz contest to win exciting prizes!

subject: Office holiday
body_text: Office will remain closed on 2 October 2025 for Gandhi Jayanti.

subject: Library notice
body_text: Return your library books before the due date.

subject: Maintenance notice
body_text: Scheduled maintenance on Sunday between 2 AM and 6 AM.

subject: Campus recruitment
body_text: TCS will be conducting recruitment drives next week.

subject: Join AWS Webinar
body_text: Join AWS experts for a live webinar on cloud innovations. Learn directly from AWS architects. Visit https://aws.amazon.com/events/.

subject: Google Cloud Newsletter
body_text: Stay updated with the latest Google Cloud innovations and tutorials. Visit https://cloud.google.com/blog for more.

subject: LinkedIn Learning Update
body_text: Here are new courses recommended for your career growth. Start learning on https://linkedin.com/learning.

subject: Coursera Weekly Digest
body_text: Explore new online courses from top universities. Visit https://coursera.org.

subject: Microsoft Security Alert
body_text: Your Microsoft account was accessed from a new device. If this was you, ignore this message. Otherwise, change your password.

subject: GitHub Security Newsletter
body_text: Learn how to secure your open source projects. Read more on https://github.blog/security/.

subject: Udemy Promotion
body_text: Get 50% off on your next course. Offer valid till midnight. Visit https://udemy.com to learn more.

subject: Amazon Prime Update
body_text: Your Prime Video subscription has been renewed successfully. Enjoy the latest movies on https://primevideo.com.

subject: Slack Feature Announcement
body_text: We’ve added new features to improve your workspace collaboration. Learn more at https://slack.com/blog.

subject: Spotify Account Notification
body_text: Your Spotify Premium payment was successful. Listen now at https://spotify.com.

subject: Netflix Account Notification
body_text: Your Netflix subscription is renewed successfully. Enjoy streaming at https://netflix.com.

subject: Coursera Event Invite
body_text: Join Coursera’s live session on learning analytics this Thursday at 6PM.

subject: Google Developer Newsletter
body_text: Get monthly updates about Android, Flutter, and AI development. Visit https://developer.google.com.

subject: IBM Tech Event
body_text: Join IBM experts live for an AI-powered data analytics session. Visit https://ibm.com/events.
